data.title: The Right Stuff [New Blu-ray] Scott Glenn , Ed Harris , Barbara Hershey 883929618095
data.meta_description:
Experience the thrilling true story of America's first astronauts in "The Right Stuff." This Blu-ray edition features stunning 16:9 aspect ratio and English, French, and Spanish subtitles. The film, directed by Philip Kaufman and starring Sam Shepard, Scott Glenn, Ed Harris, Dennis Quaid, and Barbara Hershey, follows the journey of the Mercury Seven as they push the boundaries of space exploration.

With a PG rating and a runtime of 193 minutes, this standard edition Blu-ray comes in a stylish Blu-ray case from Warner Home Video. It is region A compatible and features with subtitles, making it accessible to a wider audience. Don't miss out on this incredible drama that captures the spirit of adventure and bravery that defined America's space race.
